original_text: Their minds will start to think clearly. It is the Devil who has made them believe wrong things. He has made them do what he wants. Now they can get free from his power.
korean_text: 그들로 깨어 마귀의 올무에서 벗어나 하나님께 사로잡힌 바 되어 그 뜻을 따르게 하실까 함이라

sentences.original_text: Their minds will start to think clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 마음은 명확하게 생각하기 시작할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It is the Devil who has made them believe wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 잘못된 것들을 믿게 한 것은 악마입니다

sentences.original_text: He has made them do what he wants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들로 하여금 자기가 원하는 대로 하게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: Now they can get free from his power
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들은 그의 권능에서 벗어날 수 있습니다
